Dash Tasti-Crisp Air Fryer Review

Compact and lightweight air fryer ideal for small portions and limited counter space.

Check price View on Amazon

Quick verdict

Dash Tasti-Crisp Air Fryer is best for Apartments, dorms, and solo cooking. It stands out for Ultra-compact air fryer for tight spaces, but may not suit buyers who need Families or batch cooking.

Specs

Capacity 2.6 qt
Power 1000 W
Temperature range 200–400°F
Basket type Nonstick, round
Controls Manual dial
Dishwasher safe parts Yes
Warranty 1 year
Noise level Low

Pros

  • Very compact design
  • Quick heat-up
  • Simple controls
  • Affordable price

Cons

  • Small capacity
  • Not suitable for full meals

Alternatives

Ninja AF101

Great crisping at a lower price point

FAQ

Is the Dash Tasti-Crisp powerful enough?
Yes, it is powerful enough for small portions like fries, nuggets, and vegetables.
